name: Bog Wiz
description:
A Small platformer in which you play as Bog the Wizard,  who's in a quest for Crystals... 

First platformer, and first game that I finish, Yeay ! I had planned to release this for the LowRez jam but due to unexpected circumstances, I could only share it with you now. Still buggy, but I'll try to fix some bugs and maybe add some levels later. (Need mor skills at level designing !)

Anyway, hope you guys and gals enjoy it !
